summary: "Escape from New York" is a 1981 sci-fi action film by John Carpenter, starring Kurt Russell. In a crime-ridden 1997, Manhattan is a maximum-security prison. When Air Force One crashes there, prisoner Snake Plissken is given 24 hours to rescue the President in exchange for a pardon. Filmed in Missouri, it became a cult classic and grossed over $50 million, spawning a sequel, "Escape from L.A."
title: Escape from New York
